attributes.action: Raise voting age to 18 years old
attributes.additional_details: In my opinion (as a young person myself) 16 year olds are not mature enough to make decisions on this country’s future. The lowering of the voting age was clearly a desperate attempt by Labour to try and gain a few cheap votes in the next election and I do not believe that it was properly thought through.
attributes.background: Raise the voting age from 16 back to 18

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't lower the voting age to 16
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733604
